attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This garment is not a requirement in Muslim law. It alienates, and separates the wearer from normal British society, and it is more and more frequently being utilized in the perpetration of criminal acts, often by males.It is a danger, as it restrict the view of drivers, and while it is allowed, some women will be compelled to wear it, thus subjugating them.
